qas.question: After the Peterloo massacre what poet wrote The Massacre of Anarchy?
His poem is considered the first kind of what type of protest?
What famous author used similarity and likeness of Percy Shelly in his writing?
Inspired by Shelley what was the name of Gandhi's doctrine?
Gandhi often referenced Shelley's poem in his efforts to do what?

answers.text: during the campaign for a free India

qas.question: Who wrote the poem The Mark of Anarchy?
The Mark of Anarchy was written to protest against what?
What was the principle shown in The Mark of Anarchy?
Which famous Indian practiced civil disobedience?
In what year was the Satyagraha massacre?
What was written by Ghandi in 1819?

plausible_answers.text: It is perhaps the first modern[vague] statement of the principle of nonviolent protest

qas.question: Why did Ghandi write The Mask of Anarchy?

plausible_answers.text: begins with the images of what he thought to be the unjust forms of authority of his time

qas.question: What theme does Ghandi begin The Mask of Anarchy with?
What would Henry David Thoreau quote to audiences in India?
